description:
A special forces team bursts in to apprehend Shishigami. Shion and her grandmother are shot in the crossfire, and Shishigami manages to grab them before escaping. After taking them to safety, he wishes Shion a happy life. One day, Mari sees her father and Ando together. She follows after and sees Inuyashiki fly off into the sky. That night, Shishigami attacks a police station in vengeance.
Source: amazon
